entry.text:
[B6A67B]For the period of subscription you will get:[-]
- Double in-game shop point income. - [i]Special stand out shade of green name color in-game.[/i] - [b]Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels.[/b] - Ability to set second home location (/sethome2 and /home2). - Access to a /bag chat command that will take you back to your death location. - Access to /donor Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches - You are allowed to have 13 land claims placed per map. - Permanent player buffs
[B6A67B]Player Buffs -[-] [679267]Tier 2[-]
- 5% XP Gain increase - 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 5% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 5% loot bonus
